plot: A man trapped in an office building tries to escape as a series of strange, "Twilight-Zone"-esque events force him to confront his past and, ultimately, his father.
title: Time Enough at Last
plot_es: A man trapped in an office building tries to escape as a series of strange, "Twilight-Zone"-esque events force him to confront his past and, ultimately, his father.
plot_en: A man trapped in an office building tries to escape as a series of strange, "Twilight-Zone"-esque events force him to confront his past and, ultimately, his father.
